text:
Donâ€™t know if folks have heard about this bill, called the Reproductive Health Equity Act: <http://www.oregonlive.com/pacific-northwest-news/index.ssf/2017/01/oregon_lawmakers_introduce_bil.html>
I just got a blast email that there is a legislative hearing on this bill scheduled for March 15th. It might be worth calling state house reps next week. This bill has a point of controversy in that it covers abortion care (its original intention is to expand ACA reproductive health coverage).

attachments.title: Oregon lawmakers introduce bill to protect reproductive health care
attachments.text: The "Reproductive Health Equity Act" would protect free birth control and require health insurers to cover other reproductive health services, including well-woman care, prenatal care, breastfeeding support, testing for sexually transmitted infections and abortions.
attachments.fallback: OregonLive.com: Oregon lawmakers introduce bill to protect reproductive health care
